longBusinessSummary: Dish TV India Limited provides direct to home (DTH) and teleport services in India. It offers connected devices, such as Dish SMRT Hub and DTH Stream; zing digital, a regional content in digital picture quality and stereophonic sound; and SD set top box, and hybrid box. The company provides DTH services under Dish TV, Zing Super, and D2H brands. In addition, it offers value-added services; and OTT platform of the Dish group under Watcho brand name. The company distributes its products and services through a network of distributors and dealers. Dish TV India Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Noida, India.
